financial_benefits.benefit: No Income Tax on Foreign Income
financial_benefits.description: Guadeloupe does not tax foreign income, making it attractive for digital nomads.
Guadeloupe uses the Euro (EUR), providing a stable financial environment.

lifestyle_benefits.description: Enjoy a warm tropical climate throughout the year in Guadeloupe.
Experience a rich blend of French and Caribbean cultures, cuisine, and traditions.

additional_benefits.description: French is the official language, useful for those familiar with the language or seeking to learn.
Explore stunning beaches, rainforests, and volcanic landscapes across the archipelago.

key_consideration: Consider Guadeloupe for its tax benefits on foreign income, Euro currency, and vibrant French-Caribbean lifestyle.
action_comment: Explore Guadeloupe for its unique blend of French culture and Caribbean charm amidst beautiful natural surroundings.
tagline: Discover Guadeloupe: Where French elegance meets Caribbean warmth.
tax_residency_trigger_details: You become a tax resident if you spend 183 days or more in Guadeloupe in a calendar year.

visas.key_consideration: Allows for stays of up to 90 days within a 180-day period for tourism or business purposes.

income_requirement.misc_details: Proof of sufficient funds to cover expenses during the stay.

application_fee.details: Fee per applicant, may vary by nationality.

visas.renewability_details: May be extended in-country under certain circumstances.
required_documents: Passport valid for at least 3 months beyond the intended stay
Health insurance covering the duration of stay

visas.key_consideration: For stays longer than 90 days, required for employment, study, or family reunion.

income_requirement.misc_details: Proof of sufficient funds to support oneself without relying on public assistance.

application_fee.details: Fee per applicant, may vary by nationality.

visas.renewability_details: May be renewed for long-term stays depending on visa category.
required_documents: Valid passport with at least 1 year validity
